title: Identify me?
content:
IVOR the engine

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IVOR type.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531082814/http:/typophile.com/files/IVOR%20type_0.pdf) | 27.42 KB |
author: Sneaky Badger

comments.content: Does anyone recognise the font used in the attached pdf?

It seems to me that this lettering is hand-drawn, since the e’s seem slightly different. You might find something similar by searching for “wood type”, or “Western”.

- Mike Yanega

Adrian Frutiger’s [Westside](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531082814/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/westside/) is the most similar font I have found so far.

Garry, in the future, please use an image instead of PDF, and please try to use a more descriptive title. It’s hard for us to find a thread with such a common title, if they all say the same thing. “IVOR the engine” would have been a great title, as an example.

- Mike Yanega
